snippet: Seventeen new pardons are a step in the right direction but are still disappointing for a president whose clemency record is woeful.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Pres Obama for timid use of his power to grant pardons; contends that 17 people pardoned by Obama are step in right direction, but also served to highlight his woeful clemency record.
lead_paragraph: Seventeen new pardons are a step in the right direction but are still disappointing for a president whose clemency record is woeful.

headline.seo: President Obama’s Timid Use of the Pardon Power
headline.main: Timid Use of the Pardon Power
headline.print_headline: Timid Use of the Pardon Power
